emails.subject: RE: Amaggi Platform
emails.to: Lucas Rosa; Saber Khalfallah; Support Dnext
emails.body_text:
Sure but we cannot charge Amaggi more just for this but we can do for sure.  

 

From: Lucas Rosa <lucas.rosa@dnext.io> 
Sent: Thursday, 14 August 2025 19:51
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>; Guillaume Goudy <guillaume.goudy@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Amaggi Platform

 

GG, i see this as a good opportunity to start to build a structure for the cotton crop, once amaggi has this as a focus.

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> > 
Sent: quinta-feira, 14 de agosto de 2025 14:21
To: Lucas Rosa <lucas.rosa@dnext.io <mailto:lucas.rosa@dnext.io> >; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >; Guillaume Goudy <guillaume.goudy@dnext.io <mailto:guillaume.goudy@dnext.io> >
Subject: RE: Amaggi Platform

 

Hello Lucas,

 

Amaggi don’t have cotton as a product in their contract that’s why they do not see it in their dashboards.

 

@Guillaume Goudy <mailto:guillaume.goudy@dnext.io>  should i add cotton to them considering its not in the product list in their contract form ?

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

From: Lucas Rosa <lucas.rosa@dnext.io <mailto:lucas.rosa@dnext.io> > 
Sent: Thursday, August 14, 2025 18:11
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Subject: Amaggi Platform

 

Hello All, how are you?

 

Is it possible to give permission for Amaggi over the USDA cotton crop numbers and Stats? They are complaining about it and it will be a good improvement for them.
emails.body_html:
Sure but we cannot charge Amaggi more just for this but we can do for sure.  

 

From: Lucas Rosa <lucas.rosa@dnext.io>
Sent: Thursday, 14 August 2025 19:51
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>; Guillaume Goudy <guillaume.goudy@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Amaggi Platform

 

GG, i see this as a good opportunity to start to build a structure for the cotton crop, once amaggi has this as a focus.

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Sent: quinta-feira, 14 de agosto de 2025 14:21
To: Lucas Rosa <lucas.rosa@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>; Guillaume Goudy <guillaume.goudy@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Amaggi Platform

 

Hello Lucas,

 

Amaggi don’t have cotton as a product in their contract that’s why they do not see it in their dashboards.

 

@Guillaume Goudy should i add cotton to them considering its not in the product list in their contract form ?

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah
